ops.description: createLineTrigger({x1:45, y1:146, z1:0, x2:114, y2:28, z2:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // Well,
would you mind leaving us alone?{PAUSE}I want to enjoy some quiet time
together with my wife.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // Hmmdid you say Nibelheim?
Wasn't it in the news a while back?{PAUSE}Something to do with a reactor accident{PAUSE}That was the first major Mako accident,
I remember it was all over the news.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // Ha, Ha! Well,
there's nothin' wrong with that, I'd say.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // But if you still have a family,
you outta at least write them.{PAUSE}You may leave
your home, but
it'll always be there for you.{PAUSE}At least that's how I see it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // We want him to be happy
and do other things while he's young,
but we can't help but worry{PAUSE}I guess we always will.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // Ha! Ha!
I wonder if my son's already left?{PAUSE}When it's just my wife and I here,
you have no idea how lonesome it gets.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // Ha, Ha! Well,
there's nothin' wrong with that, I'd say.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // He used to give us nothing but headaches
when he was here, but now that
he's gonewe kind of miss him.{PAUSE}Strange, isn't it?

dialogStrings:
Ha, Ha! Well,
there's nothin' wrong with that, I'd say.

Ha! Ha!
I wonder if my son's already left?{PAUSE}When it's just my wife and I here,
you have no idea how lonesome it gets.

We want him to be happy
and do other things while he's young,
but we can't help but worry{PAUSE}I guess we always will.

By the way{PAUSE}Where are you from?{PAUSE}
{CHOICE}A village called Nibelheim
{CHOICE}Who cares?

But if you still have a family,
you outta at least write them.{PAUSE}You may leave
your home, but
it'll always be there for you.{PAUSE}At least that's how I see it.

Hmmdid you say Nibelheim?
Wasn't it in the news a while back?{PAUSE}Something to do with a reactor accident{PAUSE}That was the first major Mako accident,
I remember it was all over the news.

This might sound rude, but{PAUSE}Is your family still living?
{CHOICE}I forgot about them long ago
{CHOICE}I'm just an ex-SOLDIER

Well, you really outta go home again.
And if you can't do that,
try and at least remember them sometimes.

Our boy acted like you,
When he was a kid.{PAUSE}You seem to be about his age.

Well,
would you mind leaving us alone?{PAUSE}I want to enjoy some quiet time
together with my wife.

He used to give us nothing but headaches
when he was here, but now that
he's gonewe kind of miss him.{PAUSE}Strange, isn't it?
